ValidationRule.description: Ensures the resolution code is populated on case close
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Bypass_Data_enforcement__c = FALSE && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") && NOT(ClosedBySystem__c) && ISBLANK(TEXT(ResolutionCode__c)) && OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "SSSW"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, 'Unified') ) && NOT(ISNEW())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Resolution Code before you can close the case
